text: Thought I'd move this idea over here from the GDD Slack... Thanks to AJ for commenting.
Can we also have the help bubble on the bottom right be a bit smaller? maybe more padding on left/right then top, its covering the horizontal button on the HubDB table
<@U2H3TT8F2|ajlaporte> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/ajlaporte/F6XUF6N3A/pasted_image_at_2017_09_05_04_00_pm.png|Pasted image at 2017-09-05, 4:00 PM>

or if we could even implement a "table overview" link that shows you the name of the column and type it is, like:
```
ID - AUTO
TITLE - TEXT
PATH - TEXT
NAME - TEXT
DATE - DATE/TIME
DESCRIPTION - RICH TEXT
...
```
This would make it easier for larger tables so we can quickly reference the column types
i mean i know you can via api but it might be easier ref for having that in the HubDB view also for those who dont know how to use the API's (data entry folks)
